# Preview in Browser

Automatically opens VS Code Simple Browser when you open `.md` or `.html` files from the `content/` folder.

## Features

- Auto-detects Hugo content files
- Opens Simple Browser with the corresponding URL
- Configurable base URL
- Can be enabled/disabled via settings

## Settings

- `previewInBrowser.enabled`: Enable/disable auto preview (default: true)
- `previewInBrowser.baseUrl`: Hugo server URL (default: http://localhost:1313)

## Usage

Just open any file from `content/` folder and the preview will open automatically!
